title: Public transport for the NRL Round 14 –  Melbourne Storm v North Queensland Cowboys:  Friday 6 June 2025
articleContent:
The 2025 NRL Season continues at AAMI Park when Melbourne Storm takes on North Queensland Cowboys. Public transport is your best way to enjoy the action.

Extra services will help you get home from AAMI Park.

Kick-off is at 6:00 pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station

  • Glen Waverley – leaving at 8:25 pm from Platform 10
  • Ringwood – leaving at 8:10 pm from Platform 9
  • Sandringham – leaving at 8:14 pm from Platform 2
  • Frankston – leaving at 8:13 pm from Platform 4

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70

  • Trams will operate from Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

 Metropolitan bus

Customers can catch the following buses close to the MCG:

  • Route 246

 Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station
